p: While there may be variation among individuals that confounds the potential effects of drug resistance mutations on transmission fitness, the overall patterns of viral fitness identified in this study are consistent with other measures of the fitness cost of resistance mutations such as site-directed mutagenesis or reversion rates [ 10â€“ 12].
